Package lab8

Class RecursiveQuestion

  • java.lang.Object
    • lab8.RecursiveQuestion
  • public class RecursiveQuestion
extends java.lang.Object
    RecursiveQuestion is a compilation of methods. Each method is solved recursively. This class contains one inner class Towers. Towers is a data structure used for HanoiTower.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  RecursiveQuestion.Towers
      Towers has 3 towers each of length n.

      • HanoiTower

        public static void HanoiTower​(RecursiveQuestion.Towers t,
                              int n,
                              int start,
                              int target,
                              int spare)
        Hanoi solves the Hanoi tower problem. Precondition is left to be checked by the user for this method.
        Parameters:
        t - : Towers object to be used.
        n - : number of rings on first tower.
        start - : tower begins with all rings, finishes empty
        target - : begins empty, finishes with all rings
        spare - : begins empty, finishes empty

      • Permutation

        public static void Permutation​(int[] a,
                               int prefix)
        Print permutations of a set. To print all permutations, To permutate all elements, set prefix = 0
        Parameters:
        a - : array to permutate
        prefix -

      • ArraySwap

        public static int[] ArraySwap​(int[] a,
                              int x,
                              int y)
        Reverses order of elements of array from element x to element y inclusive.
        Parameters:
        a - : array to be swapped
        x - : first element to be swapped (Element 1 is a[0]. Element 0 is invalid.)
        y - : last element to be swapped (y < )
        Returns:
        swapped array

      • pow

        public static double pow​(double x,
                         int n)
        Compute x^n This method is O(log(n)). Worst case is a negative, odd value of n. Which will take two more calls before it gets to an even n value.
        Parameters:
        x -
        n -
        Returns:
        x^n
